10px;padding:0px;direction:ltr;word-wrap:break-word"><span class="m_2734410611319145199gmail-BVRRReviewText" style="box-sizing:border-box;zoom:1;word-wrap:break-word">This is by far the best deodorant that I&#39;ve owned. I never thought that I would spend so much money on a deodorant but as I was spending more and more time on my feet during the day and continued to be so disappointed with every single deodorant that I had in the past I figured why not give cashmere mist a try. <br style="box-sizing:border-box">Boy I was not disappointed. <br style="box-sizing:border-box">I&#39;ve been using it for about 2 weeks now and I just love it. It glides smoothly, had a chalky appearance sometimes upon applying it but it DOES NOT stain your clothes which is just fabulous. <br style="box-sizing:border-box">The fragrance is very subtle, almost unnoticeable to people around you. Nonetheless no matter how much you sweat this sucker will hold on very tightly to all of the moisture and leave your underarms dry and sweet.<br style="box-sizing:border-box">I will definitely continue to use this product.</span></div></div></div><div class="m_2734410611319145199gmail-BVRRReviewDisplayStyle5Tags" style="box-sizing:border-box;margin:0px 0px 10px;padding:0px;direction:ltr;word-wrap:break-word"><span class="m_2734410611319145199gmail-BVRRReviewText" style="box-sizing:border-box;zoom:1;word-wrap:break-word">After reading many reviews of Donna Karan Cashmere Mist Deodorant, I decided to give it a try. I have always been an &quot;overachiever&quot; when it comes to perspiring. Although it doesn&#39;t stop my perspiring entirely it does help curb it. It is the fragrance that has me hooked. When I do perspire I don&#39;t have an overly scented drugstore deodorant fragrance hanging off me. Instead I have a wonderfully soft warm fragrance that is easily mistaken for perfume. And even though I may have some small traces of perspiration on my underarms, I know I smell great.</span></div></div></div><div class="m_2734410611319145199gmail-BVRRReviewDisplayStyle5Tags" Cashmere Mist deodorant and so happy I did. It goes on dreamy, soft, with no need to wait for it to dry. Ready to slip on your clothes and go out with confidence. It doesn&#39;t fail me at the end of my long days. And, although I do see a small amount of residue transfer on my bra and tops, it washes off completely, even in my delicate wash cycle. I don&#39;t get this result using my Lady Mitchum! This product performs absolute best when skin is clean and I make sure that I get full coverage on my entire underarm. No embarrassing odors, and I feel confident all day long. I love that I can use this with Cashmere Mist fragrance AND Donna&#39;s new fragrances this season-Liquid Cashmere Black, Blush or White..........it just smells lovely all
